Reviews.Content: business trip phoenix stayed 4 nights homewood suites phoenix north happy valley booked nonsmoking bedroom suite homewood suites phoenix north happy valley hotel confirmation indicated nonsmoking smoking smoking floor night horror informed hotel capacity convert smoking nonsmoking smoke permeates drapes carpet bedding furniture theres smoking smoke free overnight nonsmoking available business meeting started 800 am morning eyes burn difficulty breathing nostrils irritated miserable sleepless night nonsmoker ordeal staff managers sympathetic promised nonsmoking day day business meeting hotel staff moved personal items nonsmoking nonsmoking floor ok bliss started returned business meeting entered wonderful nonsmoking bedroom suite spacious clean looked bed comfortable kitchen 2 burner stove oven microwave sized refrigerator perks included free wireless access breakfast hot items eggs sausage wasnt monthurs evenings theres complimentary light meal beverages staff friendly guests feel welcome outdoor shopping happy valley towne center shops lots restaurants located hotel hotel interstate 17 theres short drive reach anthem outlet mall cave creek overall rating hotel werent night horror practice putting nonsmokers smoking
